title: Xi and Biden Prepare to Talk as U.S.-China Distrust Mounts
sub_head: China presents its stance as neutral; the U.S. is likely to warn Beijing against any support of Russia
body:
President Biden and Chinese leader Xi Jinping plan to confer as the U.S. works to deter China from deeper involvement with Russia during its invasion of Ukraine.
The call, scheduled for Friday, comes as Beijing is trying to present itself as eager to help prevent the Ukraine crisis from worsening furtherâ€”without abandoning its alignment with Moscow.
